scripts.dev: nuxt generate && cp -R .output ./pocketbase && pm2-runtime start ecosystem.config.js
nuxt generate build && cp -R build/.output/ ./pocketbase && pm2-runtime start ecosystem.config.js
scripts.build:prod: nuxt generate && cp -R .output ./pocketbase && go build -o pocketnuxt pocketbase/main.go
nuxt generate && cp -R build/.output/ ./pocketbase && go build -o pocketnuxt pocketbase/main.go
